articles.title: Here’s what Boston meteorologists are saying about the timing and impacts of the Sunday-Monday nor’easter
articles.description:
"Heavy snow, strong winds, & coastal flooding are all increasingly possible."

The post Here’s what Boston meteorologists are saying about the timing and impacts of the Sunday-Monday nor’easter appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Meteorologists predict heavy snow and strong winds for Boston on February 22-23, 2026.
Coastal flooding risks increase, affecting waterfront areas and local infrastructure.
Residents should prepare for potential power outages and travel disruptions due to severe weather.

articles.title: Alex Bregman declines to respond to Sam Kennedy’s comments about player’s Red Sox departure
articles.description:
“I just really don’t want to get into it. It’s not worth it.”

The post Alex Bregman declines to respond to Sam Kennedy’s comments about player’s Red Sox departure appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Alex Bregman declined to comment on Sam Kennedy's remarks regarding his departure from the Red Sox.
Bregman stated, 'It's not worth it,' indicating disinterest in the ongoing discussion.
This situation may affect fan perceptions of player relations with the Red Sox organization.

articles.title: Team USA crushes Slovakia, advances to Olympic men’s hockey gold-medal game against Canada
articles.description:

summary: Team USA defeated Slovakia to reach the Olympic men's hockey gold medal game.
The gold medal match against Canada is scheduled for Sunday at 8:10 a.m. ET.
Boston residents can support Team USA as they compete for Olympic glory.

articles.title: Red Sox INF Marcelo Mayer has to earn spot on Opening Day roster, Alex Cora says
